data.title: SALAMANCA PRAYER TIMES: مواقيت الصلاة
data.meta_description: Salamanca Prayer Times - Today Salamanca prayer timings are Fajr Time 5:00 AM, Dhuhr Time 1:19 PM, Asr Time 5:09 PM, Maghrib Time 8:12 PM and Isha Time 9:37 PM. Get monthly Salamanca salah timings and 7 days accurate Salamanca prayer time table.
data.text:
Today Prayer Times Salamanca, USA

Today 17 Aug, 2024, Salamanca Namaz Timings are Fajr 5:00 AM, Dhuhr 1:19 PM, Asr 5:09 PM, Maghrib 8:12 PM & Isha 9:37 PM.

The city azan, salat schedule & 7 days time table is also provided. Daily Fajar (Fajr) timing in Salamanca, Dhuhur time, Asr time in Salamanca, Maghrib Salamanca prayer times & Isha Salamanca Namaz timing are available. Today's 13 Safar 1446 Salamanca namaz timing with next 7 days Schedule from 17 Aug, 2024 to 23 Aug, 2024 with customizable prayer time calculation methods to calculate the proper time for your prayer. On other hand, you may also read Salamanca zawal time updates with complete start and end time details.

Today Salamanca Sun Set time or Iftar Time in Salamanca is 6:25 AM and Dawn break Time or the end of Sehri Time in Salamanca is 5:00 AM. Along with Salamanca Prayers times you can also read the Salamanca Sehri and Iftar time for Fiqa Hanafi (sunni) or Salamanca Sehri and Iftar time for Fiqa Jafria (shia).

Prayer Timing Customization

By using this option you can change or adjust timing according to your country's prayer calculation methods. These timings are available for all Sunni schools of thought including Hanafi, Shafi, Maliki, and Hanbali.

You may also find here makrooh time updates including Salamanca zawal time with complete details start and end time.

Salamanca Sun Set time that is also called Iftar Time in Salamanca is 8:13 PM and Dawn break Time that is also end of Sehri Time in Salamanca at 4:59 AM. Sehri and Iftar time is also called Ramadan Time during the month of Ramadan.

Salamanca Prayer Times Today

Prayer Time in Salamanca for Saturday 17 Aug 2024 are:

Fajr Time in Salamanca: 5:00 AM

Zuhr Time in Salamanca: 1:19 PM

Asr Time in Salamanca: 5:09 PM

Maghrib Time in Salamanca: 8:12 PM

Isha Time in Salamanca: 9:37 PM

Q: What is Fajr time in Salamanca?

A: Fajr start time in Salamanca is at 5:00 AM and end time is 6:25 AM. Fajr consists of 4 Rakats as 2 Farz and 2 Sunnah.

Q: What time is Ishraq in Salamanca?

A: Ishraq Namaz Timing in Salamanca today starts at 06:40 AM and the end time is 09:51 AM.

Q: What is Zuhr Time in Salamanca?

A: Zuhr starting time in Salamanca is at 1:19 PM and the ending time is 5:09 PM. Zuhr Salah consists of 12 Rakat, including 4 Sunnah, 4 Farz, 2 Sunnah, and 2 nafl.

Q: What is Asr time in Salamanca?

A: Today Asr prayer start time in Salamanca is 5:09 PM, and it ends at 8:12 PM. It's an afternoon prayer consisting of 8 Rakat: 4 Sunnat and 4 Farz.

Q: What time is Maghrib in Salamanca?

A: Maghrib start time in Salamanca is at 8:12 PM, and the maghrib time end is 9:37 PM. It's a sunset prayer consisting of 7 Rakat: 3 Farz, 2 Sunnat, and 2 Nafl.

Q: What is Isha Time in Salamanca?

A: Today Isha Namaz time Salamanca starts at 9:37 PM and ends time at 5:00 AM. It's a night prayer consisting of 17 Rakat: 4 Sunnah, 4 Fard, 2 Sunnah, 2 Nafl, 3 Witr, and 2 Nafl.
